name: ABSQLiteManager
summary: ABSQLiteManager is a lightweight SQLite reading library for iOS. It can be used to quickly convert SQLite database to Foundation objects.
description:
It provides:

    * Converting SQLite database to Foundation objects.
    * Listing table structure
    * Listing table names
    * Listing column names
    * Easily fetching rows from tables
    * Easily fetching rows by using sql queries
    * Support for NSPredicate
    * Swift 4 support
